SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
App
Main application class for Gang 34 GUI.
Cashier_Controller
Cashier screen controller - wires up tables, cart ops, and submits orders.
Cashier_Controller.CartRowView
Simple cart row model for the cart table (id, name, cost, qty, modify).
Cashier_Controller.ItemRowView
Simple item row model for the items table (id, name, cost).
CurrentMenuController
Manager view for current menu - see items, tweak price/stock, toggle active, add/delete items.
CurrentMenuController.ItemView
Simple item view model for the current menu table (id, name, stock, cost, category, active).
db
Thin DB utility - JDBC helpers and typed row DTOs.
db.CurrentItemRow
Row for current_items view: id, item id/name, optional custom cost/note.
db.EmployeeRow
Row for employees table: id, name, manager flag.
db.ItemRow
Row for items table: id, name, category, cost, stock, active.
db.PastItemRow
Row for past_items table: order linkage, custom cost/note, timestamp.
db.PastRestockRow
Row for past_restocks table: ids, item/modification, quantities and dates.
db.SuggestedRestockRow
Row for suggested_restocks table: id, linkage, recommended qty/date, and cost.
db.ZTotals
Z-report totals container: line count and gross revenue.
DbConnectivityTest
Manual connectivity check using db.getConnection() and SELECT 1.
Employee_Controller
Employee admin screen - list/add/remove users.
Employee_Controller.EmployeeRowView
Simple employee row model for the employees table (id, name, manager, remove).
ItemController
Item analytics page - pick an item, show sales charts and restock history.
ItemController.RestockRowView
Row model for the restocks table (quantity and date string).
ItemRecommendation
Tiny data holder for recommendation rows - item name, note, stock, price.
LandingController
Manager landing hub - shows time/date and links out to sections.
LoginController
Controller class for handling login-related navigation in the JavaFX application.
ProjectController
The ProjectController class handles navigation between different views in the JavaFX application.
RecommendationsController
Recommendations page - shows suggestions and lets you tweak price inline.
ReportsController
Reports dashboard - regular report table, X-report (live day), and Z-report run.
ReportsController.ReportRow
Row model for the regular report table: name, stock, price, suggested qty/date.
ReportsController.XReportData
Internal accumulator for X-report metrics used to build ReportsController.XReportRow.
ReportsController.XReportRow
Row model for the X-report: itemName, salesCount, revenue, avgPrice, lastSaleTime.
